trans-unit.source: Deploy the ARM template by using PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Deploy the ARM template by using PowerShell

trans-unit.source: To deploy the ARM template you downloaded by using PowerShell, follow the steps below.
trans-unit.target: To deploy the ARM template you downloaded by using PowerShell, follow the steps below.

trans-unit.source: If you have never used Azure PowerShell, see [How to Install and Configure Azure PowerShell](../articles/powershell-install-configure.md) and follow the instructions all the way to the end to sign into Azure and select your subscription.
trans-unit.target: If you have never used Azure PowerShell, see [How to Install and Configure Azure PowerShell](../articles/powershell-install-configure.md) and follow the instructions all the way to the end to sign into Azure and select your subscription.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, run the **`New-AzureRmResourceGroup`** cmdlet to create a new resource group.
trans-unit.target: If necessary, run the **`New-AzureRmResourceGroup`** cmdlet to create a new resource group.

trans-unit.source: The command below creates a resource group named *TestRG* in the *Central US* azure region.
trans-unit.target: The command below creates a resource group named *TestRG* in the *Central US* azure region.

trans-unit.source: For more information about resource groups, visit [Azure Resource Manager Overview](../articles/resource-group-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about resource groups, visit [Azure Resource Manager Overview](../articles/resource-group-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Here is the expected output for the command above:
trans-unit.target: Here is the expected output for the command above:

trans-unit.source: Run the **`New-AzureRmResourceGroupDeployment`** cmdlet to deploy the new VNet by using the template and parameter files you downloaded and modified above.
trans-unit.target: Run the **`New-AzureRmResourceGroupDeployment`** cmdlet to deploy the new VNet by using the template and parameter files you downloaded and modified above.

trans-unit.source: Here is the expected output for the command above:
trans-unit.target: Here is the expected output for the command above:

trans-unit.source: Run the **`Get-AzureRmVirtualNetwork`** cmdlet to view the properties of the new VNet, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: Run the **`Get-AzureRmVirtualNetwork`** cmdlet to view the properties of the new VNet, as shown below.
